long_description: You deserve to be in the picture, and now you can be with the easy-to-use Camera Extender from Xshot. Eliminate awkward photos taken at arm's length or having to ask a stranger to take a picture for you; capture more background and scenery and take pictures from unique angles. Durable metal shaft extends to 37 in. and collapses down to 9 in. for easy carry. Camera adapter connects to tripod mount on your camera, rotates 180deg and features a quick-spin knob for easy camera mounting; thumb screw locks camera in desired position. Comfortable, non-slip grip secures Xshot in your hand for steady, stable picture taking.
short_description: You deserve to be in the picture, and now you can be with the easy-to-use Camera Extender from Xshot.
